speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. I need to talk about your damn overdue account. How's that for a nice greeting?

speaker: Customer
text: I understand. I'm aware of my account status, and I'm here to discuss it.

speaker: Agent
text: Listen up! I don't have time for this crap. Just verify your freaking address so we can get this over with.

speaker: Customer
text: Sure, my address is 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA.

speaker: Agent
text: Great! You’ve got a balance of $750. What the hell are you planning to do about it?

speaker: Customer
text: I can make a payment arrangement if that works for you.

speaker: Agent
text: Arrangement? What the hell is wrong with you? Just pay it off already!

speaker: Customer
text: I appreciate your urgency, but I have my own financial situation to manage.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, well, that’s not my problem! Just get it sorted or face the consequences!

speaker: Customer
text: I see you're quite passionate. I will work on this right away.

speaker: Agent
text: Passionate? I'm just sick of dealing with deadbeats like you!

speaker: Customer
text: I assure you, I am addressing my obligations.

speaker: Agent
text: Well, you'd better make it happen, or we're going to have a serious problem!

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for your time. I'll follow up soon regarding my payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: Whatever, just don’t waste my time!
